name: Vagrant site
description: installation instruction, official manuals and docs.

name: GitHub repo
description: source code, issues discussion and collaboration.

name: Vagrantbox.es
description: the biggest list of all available boxes, maintained by community via GitHub pull requests.

name: Vagrant Cloud
description: config share, boxes distribution and discovery (also premium features of private collaboration and sharing).

name: Cloud Images Ubuntu.com
description: "clean" official Ubuntu cloud images.

name: Baseboxes from Opscode
description: CentOS, Fedora, Debian, FreeBSD, Ubuntu.

name: Puppet Labs Vagrant Boxes
description: these boxes are provided to be used by various Puppet projects.

name: Cloudsmith
description: A fully managed package management SaaS with support for Vagrant repositories (and many others).

name: All available build in provisioning providers
description: official doc.

name: Vaprobash
description: Vagrant Provisioning Bash Scripts.

name: List of available Vagrant plugins from GitHub wiki.
vagrant-vbguest
description: autoupdate VirtualBox guest additions (according to VB version).

name: vagrant-hostsupdater
description: adds an entry to your /etc/hosts file on the host system.

name: vagrant-cachier
description: share a common package (apt-get, npm, etc.) cache among similar VM instances.

name: vagrant-host-shell
description: a vagrant provisioner to run commands on the host when a VM boots.

name: vagrant-ansible-local  allow provisioning your VM with ansible playbooks directly from the guest VM.
sahara
description: easy manage VM state (commit/rollback while experimenting with software stack).

name: vagrant-registration
description: add "register" and "unregister" capabilities to Vagrant guests for updates on systems with a subscription model(like Red Hat Enterprise Linux).

name: vagrant-service-manager
description: enable easier access to the features and services provided by the Atomic Developer Bundle (ADB).

name: vagrant-scp
description: Copy files to a Vagrant VM via SCP.

name: Packer
description: a tool for creating identical machine images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration. For fast infrastructure deployment with multi-provider portability.

name: T.A.D.S. boilerplate
description: boilerplate to create, develop and deploy a Docker Swarm environment, using Vagrant to reproduce production environment locally.

name: Veewee
description: a tool for easily (and repeatedly) building custom Vagrant base boxes, KVMs, and virtual machine images.

name: Vagrant plugin for ZSH shell
description: auto-complete for commands, task names, box names and built-in documentation.

name: CLI Vagrant Manager
description: simple command-line tool to manage multiple vagrant boxes

name: Phansible
description: provides an easy to use interface that helps you generate Ansible Playbooks for PHP based projects.

name: PuPHPet
description: a simple GUI to set up virtual machines for PHP Web development.

name: Protobox
description: PuPHPet analog, but uses own installer with YAML configuration format to control everything that is installed on the virtual machine.

name: Rove
description: a service that allows you to pregenerate typical Vagrant builds.

name: Vagrant share
description: allows you to share your Vagrant environment with anyone in the world.

name: nip.io
description: a magic domain name that provides wildcard DNS

name: ngrok
description: tool to create secure tunnels to expose a local server behind a NAT or firewall to the internet.

name: serveo
description: expose local servers to the internet, without installing any client!

name: proxylocal.com
description: proxy your local web-server and make it publicly available over the internet.

name: localtunnel.me
description: assign you a unique publicly accessible url that will proxy all requests to your locally running webserver.

name: portmap.io
description: OpenVPN based free port forwarding solution.

name: Getting Started With Vagrant by This Programming Thing.
Getting started with Vagrant
description: automated dev servers deploy and provisioning.

name: Working with Advanced Vagrant features in PhpStorm.
Sharing Your Virtual Machine on the Web with Vagrant Share.

Vagrant Online Courses at Classpert List of Vagrant Online Courses (free and paid)
Vagrant: Up and Running by Mitchell Hashimoto.
Pro Vagrant by by Wlodzimierz Gajda.
Creating Development Environments with Vagrant / 2nd Edition by Michael Peacock
Vagrant Virtual Development Environment Cookbook by Chad Thompson
Vagrantpress
description: development environment for creating and modifying WordPress sites.

name: Varying Vagrant Vagrants
description: An open source Vagrant configuration focused on WordPress development.

name: VDD
description: Vagrant Drupal Development.

name: Drupal VM
description: A VM for local Drupal development, built with Vagrant + Ansible

name: Try Yii2
description: try Yii2 with Vagrant VM + Ansible provisioning = Complete readymade virtual server playground.

name: Laravel4-Vagrant
description: run Laravel 4 inside a Ubuntu 12.04 Vagrant Virtual Machine w/PHP 5.5.

name: Laravel Homestead
description: Official Vagrant Box for Laravel development, based on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, PHP 7, Nginx, and multiple database platforms.

name: Scotch Box
description: Simple Vagrant Box with LAMP stack, plus some useful extras, based on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.
